name: Meltdown (itch) (Ruolus)
description:
GGJ 2020 Submission

Meltdown is a head to head multiplayer game which you can play on Windows PC. There are 2 sides on the game; One player controls Repairman and other player controls Sunlight. Repairman's mission is 'Repairing damaged igloo by stealth' without getting Sunlight's attention. Sunlight's mission is 'Blocking Repairman's Mission by finding and killing him with 'SuperFire' or melting igloos'. If The Player who controlling Repairman repairs 3 igloo to max level, he/she wins the game. If The Player who controlling Sunlight destroys Repairman with 'SuperFire' or melts 5 igloo, he/she wins the game. Sunlight has 3 'SuperFire' bullet. If he couldn't burn Repairman at least using all bullets, Repairman wins the game. Meltdown is a language independent game. Everything is explained with symbols and tutorial animations.
